website_summaries.verdict: A professional grade, extra-wide tow-behind lawn sweeper with a 26 cubic feet capacity hopper.
pros: This lawn sweeper is 50 inches wide with a 9-inch chute to help prevent clogging
The hopper is collapsible or you can remove it for easier storage and the brush to wheel turning ratio is 4.5 to 1
cons: This lawn sweeper is best for large, level yards and may not produce satisfactory results on smaller lawns with uneven terrain and a variety of debris

customer_reviews.title: Do not  buy
customer_reviews.text: Picks up grass clippings well but fabric bag is worthless. The first bag ripped and fell apart after just two weeks. Ohio Steel sent me a new bag, which was great. The new bag ripped after one hour. Now Ohio Steel won't respond to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike James

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have used Craftsman sweepers for years and after tiring of their poor performance, I decided to spend a little more money and try one of these. To say I am impressed is an understatement. Arrived quick, assembly was simple, and the performance is out of this world. This thing picks up stuff my other sweeper would never be able to. The height level never slips like other brands, and the adjustability makes it easier to use. It picks up leaves, pine straw, pine cones, and anything else in its path. I am thoroughly satisfied and hope to get years of service from my sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: Professor J

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper works great. The assembly was easy to follow and complete. The only reason for the lower rating was that the box was delivered a bit damaged. When it was damaged the frame was bent. It was not bent enough for me to know immediately but it made part of the assembly a bit of a challenge and it causes a little sticking when operating. That said - it still worked and did a great job on the grass. I did not contact the seller about the damage as it was not bad enough for me to want to start over with the assembly. Even with the damage - I still give this a 4 + star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine for picking up leaves
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine for picking up leaves, small twigs, pine cones and cut grass clippings. This is my second unit I would recommend it for anyone large area racking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Greer

customer_reviews.title: I love this sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweeper! It does a great job picking up gumballs from my Sweet Gum trees. The only issue I had was the box came from UPS in terrible condition with parts falling out of the bottom. When I put it together I had a few parts missing. The sweeper base also had a big dent in the front; however, I contacted customer service and they sent me a replacement order with an Return Label for the defective one. So I did have to go through extra work to get my sweeper, but it was worth it in the end. I do love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schulte

customer_reviews.title: She said that was the best her yard ever looked
customer_reviews.text: Received the sweeper, studied the instructions, assembled it, and went and swept my BIG yard. Neighbor came over to see what I was doing and asked if I had time, would I come over and do her little yard. She said that was the best her yard ever looked! Sweeper works GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: Lee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sweeper. Clears the clippings better than I could ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sweeper. Clears the clippings better than I could with a rake! I did however, find that you DO NOT back up with this attached to your tractor. Took me several hours to repair the damage I caused. But it's fixed and still doing a great job! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis44

customer_reviews.title: Could be more durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very excited when he first got this as a gift. After using it several times this summer, the bottom of the grass catching part is starting to wear thin. For the price we paid for this wider product, it's disappointing that it is wearing out after just one summer of use.
customer_reviews.author: mmckay

customer_reviews.title: It would have been nice to have had instructions but thank goodness for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to have had instructions but thank goodness for the internet and Google. It works great when it's adjusted right and the material including pine needles are dry enough to pick up I would have given it a 5 star rating if the instructions would have been with it
customer_reviews.author: Flstffatboy

customer_reviews.title: Buy a leaf blower instead
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not worth the money. It does sweep up leaves, but hitch height is critical to get it to the right height off the ground. The leaf dumping via rope works okay, but the low ground clearance causes the bag to catch on uneven terrain and spill leaves. The adjustable height helps but wheels easily get stuck on branches and deep leaves, which stops the brushes and you have to clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is made in China, and used it twice in the bottom cloth part of the netting tore out, the pins have falling out. A total piece of junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today and I must say it did an impressive job at cleaning up the grass clippings. I mow about 4 acres and I had to dump it 4 times. I must say it was very heavy completely full and impossible to empty using the rope. I had to stand behind and lift and even then it was a struggle. I suppose I’ll need to empty it more often to avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We had a 42” lawn sweeper that was several years old. It served us well but was time to replace. This sweeper is made of much heavier materials and the spiral brush design pucks up the ful width of sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: One-Fabulous-Find

customer_reviews.title: Most useless piece of equipment that I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a no star, but that is not an option. I did not expect it to be fantastic, but I expected it to at least fill the bag more that 1/2 full. Once it reached that point it was pulling the leaves back to the ground. I was basically just spreading the leaves around the yard. Also, when the leaves are too deep the wheels will not turn. This means it is not sweeping. I saw many reviews about how great this product was. These people must be on drugs.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Following the instructions the sweeper went together quickly with no problems. After several weeks of use it has performed well with none of the problems that others listed in their reviews. In particular, the bottom surface of the hopper wearing through is not happening. I assume that keeping it on a none abrasive surface (grass) is the issue to keep it from wearing through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well built, heavy duty. Also very heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, heavy duty. Also very heavy to move manually (think when you take it off your lawn mower). Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Marc B.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a Craftsman sweeper. After rebuilding it every year I decided to try another brand. I decided on the Ohio steel sweeper. Assembly was fairly easy, I really like the way they separate the hardware into steps so you don't have to go through nuts and bolts to see which one's the proper one. It looks well-made and sturdy. The first time I used it it cleaned up the yard perfectly. I have 1 and 1/4 Acres with lot of pine straw. I would recommend the sweeper
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cattani

customer_reviews.title: Lawn sweeping is awesome..
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G. Lawn sweeping is awesome.....my lawn has never been so meticulous. This sweeper even helps to get loose dry grass / thatch up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: The Ohio Steel 50” yard sweeper was fairly easy to put together required only a 9/16 wrench. We were impressed with how well made it is. Used it the same day received and it did an awesome job and holds a LOT. However it was impossible for me to use the supplied rope to empty the full bin. Had to get off the tractor and push it up to empty it, but that is not a game changer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sweeper arrived in good order. There were alot of pieces to put ...
customer_reviews.text: The sweeper arrived in good order. There were alot of pieces to put together but all parts were there. This sweeper actually performed better than I had anticipated. In many cases it took only one pass to sweep up the grass. I would buy it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Don Emmerling

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome! Works great cheaper than bagging system for lawnmower... Also use to "sweep" drive way of pine needles.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Assembly easy..
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box was torn-beat up.. Pieces, braces-bolts,falling out of box onto floor..
customer_reviews.author: James Burson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and does a great job of picking up grass clippings!
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Took awhile to put together but we are very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to pick up our pine cones. Took awhile to put together but we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Satterthwaite

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piece of equipment and works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of equipment and works well. It's a bit awkward for emptying but it does an excellent job and does what I got it for. It's also a lot less expensive and about 1/3 the cost of the attachment for my mower that would do the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It came dented up, but I think that happened in shipping. Amazon made things right. I love it. Picks up all of my leaves, pine cones, walnuts, pine needles, etc. Definite time and energy saver.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Som

customer_reviews.title: Still in the box waiting on Spring
customer_reviews.text: Compact box - assuming assembly will take some time and patience
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Coleman

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and does good picking up leaves and twigs
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, sturdy and does good picking up leaves and twigs. Only one small issue is the dumping of the hopper. Hope to get the hang of it as I use it more. I do like the machine very much.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: assembly isn't easy. does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: heavy as lead,[, unable to back it up. assembly isn't easy. does what it is supposed to tho'
customer_reviews.author: joepeeler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY, SOLID UNIT.
customer_reviews.text: This unit was priced right, and very aesy to put together. The unit picks up small branches. pine cones, pine needles with no problem. I would recomend this unit. best for large lawns.
customer_reviews.author: alfred blackwood

customer_reviews.title: It worked very well and was easy to put
customer_reviews.text: First one of these I've ever owned. It worked very well and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: J. Sutter

customer_reviews.title: This sweeper works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper works great for me.I have a lot of lawn and oak leafs it also picks up acorns. love it.
customer_reviews.author: GAIL RATCLIFFE

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It does the job on my 1ac residential ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It does the job on my 1ac residential lot. I could have even taken the next size down.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, Easy to understand assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality, and as a single gal, I was able to easily assemble, due to very CLEAR instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Graham

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. It was easy to assemble. Again ,it works great. Good price and no more raking.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Used a full summer and was very pleased. Held up well compared to some reviews about ...
customer_reviews.text: Used a full summer and was very pleased. Held up well compared to some reviews about bag wearing out or through. Picks up heavy clippings with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does a good job but after 3 hrs of use- in 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: does a good job but after 3 hrs of use- in 2 days the catch bag had a worn hole in the fabric at the bottom of one of the support tubes. called ohio steel and they sent a new catch bag . it needs some type of strip or a plastic cover attached to the bottom of the support runners to keep it from wear from contact with the ground otherwise well made
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easily set up and makes quick work ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price , easily set up and makes quick work of cleaning up the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Product works as advertise.
customer_reviews.text: I used this yard sweeper and my yard hasn't looked this good in over 20 years. Does a fantastic job sweeping up pine needles and sweet gum tree china balls.
customer_reviews.author: Donbinnc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the money involved it's the best deal you will find.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Does a great job of cleaning up the mown grass on my 5 acre lawn
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Brad

customer_reviews.title: It does not perform well unless it is set down ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not perform well unless it is set down tightly on the grass which is hard on the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Uzial

customer_reviews.title: Saves a ton of work!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy and it works great. The only issue( user error actually) is if the grass was too long and still damp, it would bind up the wheels from the inside. I'm very happy with it just the same.
customer_reviews.author: sohrob

customer_reviews.title: the sweeper works fine Really cleans a yard
customer_reviews.text: the sweeper works fine Really cleans a yard. Very hard to dump with a full load. That also depends who is operating it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sweeper. Easy to adjust for all my yard cleaning jobs
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Boyette

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Easy to put together. Easy to use. Does a really good job cleaning up grass clippings.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, to replace a worn out one. He is happy with it, says it is much better made than his old one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m missing a lot of small bolts and pins, have to go to local hardware store
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Bowman

customer_reviews.title: and this by far is the very best!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands of sweepers, and this by far is the very best!
customer_reviews.author: George Hartle

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Son in law - he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Lois J Knabel

customer_reviews.title: But the dumping is easy.
customer_reviews.text: Little difficult to put together but works fantastically. It picks up leaves and acorns. The only problem we have is where to dump them. But the dumping is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Wissler

customer_reviews.title: Rubber  wheel falls off
customer_reviews.text: The rubber around the wheel fell off the second time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ronkoske

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly; approximately an hour
customer_reviews.text: Definitely met my expectations. Easy assembly; approximately an hour .I have been using it quite a bit with the many leaves we have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Took about 40 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. It picks up grass clippings nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Bob E.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the bag ripped right below the seem the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the bag ripped right below the seem the very first time I used it, it wont last had to patch it on my first day I used it.
customer_reviews.author: RC Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all and I was not taking chance on ...
customer_reviews.text: Sweeper was damaged from factory as there was no damage to shipping carton. Also sweeper brushes seemed to have melted and were bent on fourty-five degree angle halfway up the brush, no way it would sweep up grass. Not happy at all and I was not taking chance on another one. The company wanted me to pay return shipping , no way I didn't damage unit. I would have kept it if not damaged. Housing was bent so unit would not even work.
customer_reviews.author: bobcat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper performs flawlessley. I should have bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This lawn sweeper works great and easy to use. I have heard a lot about these, but had no clue how well they really work. My yard looks great....
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Hutson

customer_reviews.title: I am having issues with wearing under the bag. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am having issues with wearing under the bag. I only use this product on grass and do not drag across cement, dirt or any hard surfaces. The first sweeper I received the brushes were creased very badly. Amazon sent another one promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Aylor

customer_reviews.title: This sweeper works great, it will pick up just about everything as ...
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper works great, it will pick up just about everything as long as your yard is somewhat level. Saved me from a lot of raking. I should have bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is heavy. And too big for my shed. But it cleans up everything out of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: GBoswell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised! Yard is clean of cut grass and leaves in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this lawn sweeper
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lawn sweeper. I attached a carabiner to the end of the rope so that I can attach it to my mower near me and not worry about dropping it. Plus it is faster than tying and untying. I had previously used a John Deere lawn sweeper but this one is much larger and makes a big difference. It didn't look like it had a high back in the picture to me, but it is definitely high enough. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: T. Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made. The outside packaging came busted open and looked like it had been returned previously. Will wrote another review after it is put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Rampa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble if you follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble if you follow directions. Took 45 minutes. I use it to pick up grass on 3 acres. Works good on fresh mown grass.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just opened the highly damaged box and it is missing ...
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the highly damaged box and it is missing everything but the main sweeper and bag. Absolutely livid. No brackets, bolts, pins, clips, hitch tubes.
customer_reviews.author: michael palasty

customer_reviews.title: fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Prompt arrival, fairly easy to put together, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: RON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have had many lawn sweepers and I feel like this one is the best on market today
customer_reviews.author: Betty Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel L

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: My husband was able to put this together with no trouble. We have yet to use it, at we purchased it in the winter of 2012.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Self

product_meta.title: Ohio Steel 50SWP26 Pro Sweeper, 50"/26 cu. ft.
product_meta.description: The Size of the sweeper is 50 inch. Easy to use and handle. This product is manufactured in United States.
feature_bullets: The Size of the sweeper is 42 inch
5-position hitch adjustment allows custom fit to all tractor brands.Easy to use and handle
This product is manufactured in United States
